meanings.definition: A tool or device used for shaving or cutting hair.
meanings.sent1: My dad uses a razer to shave his beard every morning.
meanings.sent2: The barber carefully wielded the razer to give the customer a clean shave.
meanings.sent3: The razer accidentally slipped, giving the man a funny zigzag pattern on his face.
meanings.sent4: Her precision with the razer was like a sculptor carving a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The shiny razer gleamed under the bright lights of the salon.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that razes, destroys, or demolishes.
meanings.sent1: The tornado was a merciless razer, leaving nothing but destruction in its wake.
meanings.sent2: The demolition crew brought in heavy machinery to act as the razer of the old building.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous toddler turned into a little razer, knocking down block towers with glee.
meanings.sent4: Time can be a silent razer, slowly wearing down even the strongest structures.
meanings.sent5: The wildfire swept through the forest like a razer, clearing everything in its path.

meanings.definition: A brand of gaming peripherals, including mice and keyboards.
meanings.sent1: Gamers often choose Razer products for their high-quality performance.
meanings.sent2: The Razer mouse glowed with colorful lights as the player navigated through the virtual world.
meanings.sent3: The Razer keyboard seemed to have a mind of its own, typing out random letters during the game.
meanings.sent4: In the world of gaming, Razer is like a trusted companion for many players.
meanings.sent5: The Razer headset provided crystal-clear sound, immersing the gamer in the virtual battlefield.
